question: How do I register as an astrologer with AstroTamil?

question: How much commission does AstroTamil charge?
answer: Our charge is not fixed but it's a floating model. It depends on various factors such as time and user. But astrologer can fix their own pricing. It depends on the performance criteria such as availability time, customer rating, customer retention, response rate and golden minutes. Minimum and maximum they can fix in that. Example, starting with Rs.3 as minimum and the astrologer can fix any price maximum. In this slot, an astrologer can fix any price he/she wants. This is the best top rating which they will get it. We will not deduct anything form that. But 18% GST and 10% TDS will be deducted as per the govt norms. TDS will get added to Astrologers PAN card.
keywords: commission, charges, fee, how much commission, platform fee, AstroTamil fee, deduction, what percentage, commission rate
